posts.post_title: T206 Bresnahan Polar Bear for sale
posts.post_content:
T206 Polar Bear hall of famer Roger Bresnahan for sale. Well centered SGC40. $150.00 delivered. Check or money order only, no paypal. New York residents must add sales tax. Please use my email-edhans@monkberry,com for correspondence. Please view my website below. Thank you for looking.
